Erik Laubscher (afọ 1927, Tulbagh, South Africa rụọ úbọchị irí abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Maachị n'afọ 2013) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe nà South Africa.
A mụrụ Erik Frederik Bester Howard Laubscher na Tulbagh, ọ tolitere na Port Elizabeth

Mgbè o gosipụtara mmasị na nka, ọ malitere ọmụmụ ya na Continental School of Art n'afọ 1946. Laubscher zụrụ n'okpuru Maurice van Essche site n'afọ 1946 na afọ 1947 tupu ọ gaa n'ihu na London na Paris n'okpuru John Minton, Claude Venard na Fernand Léger. E nyere ya Carnegie Study Grant na US n'afọ 1966. Na South Africa, e nyere ya Cape Arts Medal n'afọ 1972, S.A
Akademie vir Wetenskap en Kuns - Besondere Erepenning vir Skilderkuns n'afọ 1990, na The Cape Tercentenary Foundation Award màkà onyinye pụtara ìhè na nka ányá n'afọ 1994
O guzobere Ruth Prowse School of Art na 1970 wee laa ezumike nká dị ka onye isi ya na ngwụcha afọ 1995
Ọ lụrụ onye na-ese ihe Claude Bouscharain onye ọ zutere na Académie Montmartre na 1950. N'afọ 2012 ọ natara ihe nrite Molteno màkà ihe ọ rụzuru na Fine Arts.
